mapper.select: SELECT id, project_code, name, nature_code, scope_code, status_code, start_date, end_date, leader_person_id, budget, remark FROM research_project WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO research_project(project_code, name, nature_code, scope_code, status_code, start_date, end_date, leader_person_id, budget, remark) VALUES (#{projectCode}, #{name}, #{natureCode}, #{scopeCode}, #{statusCode}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{leaderPersonId}, #{budget}, #{remark})
mapper.update: UPDATE research_project SET project_code=#{projectCode}, name=#{name}, nature_code=#{natureCode}, scope_code=#{scopeCode}, status_code=#{statusCode}, start_date=#{startDate}, end_date=#{endDate}, leader_person_id=#{leaderPersonId}, budget=#{budget}, remark=#{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM research_project p LEFT JOIN research_project_member pm ON pm.project_id = p.id WHERE pm.person_id = #{personId} ORDER BY p.id ASC
